short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Amazon product URL with ONLY product code / without title or tracking parameters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension adds a copy-link icon in front of the product title space. By just clicking the icon, a sanitized URL is copied to your clipboard.

*Please leave a review comment if it does not work in some regions. I have only checked it on .com, .co.jp, .co.uk, .de, and .fr.
